CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 7, 1964, pg. 6 reads: "Hilton Crowded for Brotherhood Food Festival - Third Prize - The Music and Art Club's table of assorted sandwiches won third prize at the Brotherhood Food Festival. Club representatives included (from left); Payola Knowles, Mary E. Jackson, chairman, and Pearl E. Stern. - Harris Photos"
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Music and Art Club members, left to right; Payola Knowles, Mary E. Jackson, wearing ribbon reading "Chairman", and Pearl E. Stern, standing behind table with signs inscribed "Music and Arts Club" and "3rd Prize"  in Hilton Hotel for Brotherhood Food Festival
